meanings.definition: nudgers: a person or thing that nudges
meanings.sent1: The little nudgers on the door help it close gently.
meanings.sent2: The nudgers on the alarm clock woke me up this morning.
meanings.sent3: The playful nudgers on the swing made it move back and forth.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like gentle nudgers, guiding me in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The nudgers on the shelf kept the books neatly organized.

meanings.sent1: The nudgers on the table helped move the puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent2: She used the nudgers to push the door open.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous nudgers on the playground kept bumping into each other.
meanings.sent4: The nudgers of fate seemed to be pushing us towards each other.
meanings.sent5: The gentle nudgers of the wind guided the leaves to the ground.
